interval: <the interval in which the IO manager algorithm should be run(secs)>
log: <log file, if element is absent then send log to stdout or /dev/null in case of daemon>

throughput_policy.stop_shared_ratio: ratio of empty cycles to stop handling multiple devices in a single worker.
throughput_policy.start_shared_ratio: ratio of worker cycles to start handling multiple devices in a single worker.
throughput_policy.add_ratio: ratio of worker cycles to add an IO core.
throughput_policy.remove_ratio: ratio of empty cycles to remove an IO core.

configurations.cores: <The number vm cores used in this configuration>

virtual_queue_classifier.items_threshold: <the maximum number of pending items allowed in a queue to be considered stuck.>
virtual_queue_classifier.max_stuck_cycles: <the maximum number of cycles a queue can be stuck without service before switching to it>
virtual_queue_classifier.latency_threshold: <the number of times a queue needs to be stuck during an epoch to be considered latency sensitive>
virtual_queue_classifier.throughput_threshold: <the number of times a queue needs to be limited during an epoch to be considered throughput oriented>
virtual_queue_classifier.work_list_max_stuck_cycles: <the maximum number of cycles the worker work list can with pending items without service>
virtual_queue_classifier.active_threshold: <the amount of bytes that has to pass through the queue to be considered active>
